name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Ageless Entity
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.
cards.flavor: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

cards.name: Agonizing Demise
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

cards.name: Ajani Vengeant
cards.text:
+1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
−2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
−7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

cards.name: Ajani's Mantra
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

cards.name: Ajani's Pridemate
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
cards.flavor:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane

cards.name: Behemoth Sledge
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample.
Equip {3}
cards.flavor:
"May this grant you all the strength of the behemoths and none of their serenity."
—Ajani

cards.name: Blazing Specter
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Brackwater Elemental
cards.text:
When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Briarhorn
cards.text:
Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Canyon Wildcat
cards.text: Mountainwalk
cards.flavor: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

cards.name: Countersquall
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"The essence of every world, every spell, and every thought is power. Nothing else matters, because nothing else exists."
—Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Cruel Ultimatum
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
cards.flavor: There is always a greater power.

cards.name: Crumbling Necropolis
cards.text:
Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."
—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

cards.name: Deep Analysis
cards.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

cards.name: Dimir Cutpurse
cards.text: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
cards.flavor: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

cards.name: Elder Mastery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
cards.flavor: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

cards.name: Essence Warden
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

cards.name: Fall
cards.text: Target player reveals two cards at random from his or her hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.

cards.name: Fire-Field Ogre
cards.text:
First strike
Unearth {U}{B}{R} ({U}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Firemane Angel
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Fleetfoot Panther
cards.text:
Flash
When Fleetfoot Panther enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Graypelt Refuge
cards.text:
Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Grazing Gladehart
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

cards.name: Griffin Guide
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
When enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Grixis Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"So many choices. Shall I choose loathing, hate, or malice today?"
—Eliza of the Keep

cards.name: Hellfire Mongrel
cards.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to him or her.
cards.flavor: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

cards.name: Icy Manipulator
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

cards.name: Igneous Pouncer
cards.text:
Haste
Swampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Jade Mage
cards.text: {2}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons."
—Jade creed

cards.name: Jhessian Zombies
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Jungle Shrine
cards.text:
Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

cards.name: Kazandu Refuge
cards.text:
Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Kird Ape
cards.text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
cards.flavor: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

cards.name: Lead the Stampede
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."
—Ajani

cards.name: Loam Lion
cards.text: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
cards.flavor: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

cards.name: Loxodon Hierarch
cards.text:
When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
{G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.
cards.flavor: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

cards.name: Malice
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor:
"Looks like we're completely outnumbered."
"Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

cards.name: Morgue Toad
cards.text: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"The toads of Urborg aren't fast, powerful, or pleasant, but they have their uses."
—Ertai

cards.name: Moroii
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"Touched by moroii"
—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

cards.name: Nacatl Hunt-Pride
cards.text:
Vigilance
{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
cards.flavor: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

cards.name: Naya Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures target player controls.
cards.flavor: Deep in nature's core lies a potential unsullied by greed or civilization.

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
cards.text:
+3: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
−2: Gain control of target creature.
−9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

cards.name: Nightscape Familiar
cards.text:
Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.
cards.flavor: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

cards.name: Obelisk of Grixis
cards.text: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

cards.name: Ogre Savant
cards.text: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: He's an oxymoron.

cards.name: Pain
cards.text: Target player discards a card.

cards.name: Pride of Lions
cards.text: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
cards.flavor: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion—many hungry lions.

cards.name: Profane Command
cards.text:
Choose two — 
• Target player loses X life. 
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Qasali Pridemage
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

cards.name: Recoil
cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.
cards.flavor: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

cards.name: Recumbent Bliss
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

cards.name: Rise
cards.text: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Rupture Spire
cards.text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Sapseep Forest
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)
Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
{G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

cards.name: Searing Meditation
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

cards.name: Shriekmaw
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Slave of Bolas
cards.text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

cards.name: Slavering Nulls
cards.text: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.
cards.flavor: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

cards.name: Spite
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

cards.name: Spitemare
cards.text: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"I knew a creature carved from a dream of wild freedom. Any attempt to leash or exploit it failed, and at terrible cost."
—Ashling

cards.name: Steamcore Weird
cards.text: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast Steamcore Weird, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

cards.name: Suffering
cards.text: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Surveilling Sprite
cards.text:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

cards.name: Sylvan Bounty
cards.text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
cards.flavor: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

cards.name: Sylvan Ranger
cards.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

cards.name: Titanic Ultimatum
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, lifelink, and trample.
cards.flavor:
"Retribution is best delivered by claws and rage, with both magnified."
—Ajani

cards.name: Undermine
cards.text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
cards.flavor: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

cards.name: Vapor Snag
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

cards.name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.

cards.name: Wild Nacatl
cards.text:
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
cards.flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

cards.name: Woolly Thoctar
cards.flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.
